extendedInfo.description: ââââââââââThe award-winning premium pocket reference for tropical fish and aquatic plants.  It includes detailed caresheets, facts, biological data and compatibility information for hundreds of freshwater home aquarium fish and aquatic plants.  Perfect for aquarium owners of all ages and experience.â¶ This is the ORIGINAL and the ONLY VERSION of Tropical Fish Guide that we produce for Android - please beware of imitators using our app name and trademarks!  Our extensive database of aquarium fish and aquatic plants has been built from years of research and consultations, it's our pride and joy.FEATURES:â   Huge A-Z list of tropical fish and plants, each with its own image and highly detailed unique profile.â   Search for tropical fish by name or by combinations of search properties.â   Mini-articles for fish keepers.â   A-Z reference of tropical aquarium, aquascaping and general fishkeeping terms.â   Calculation tools for various heating, lighting and volume requirements.â   Interactive user polls & voting.â   Free database / profile updates!â   Supports both phones and tablets.â   Supports App2SD and Move To SD (android 2.2+).â  Â No ads, no intrusive permissions, just a clean fast app for aquarium owners.â   Priced very keenly for a professional reference, just a cup of coffee!Includes Cichlids, Barbs, Tetras, Danios, Gourami, Angelfish, Catfish (Plecs, Corydoras, Synodontis), Rainbowfish, Loaches, Gobies, Gar, Platys, Mollys, Rasboras and many more aquarium fish...â¶ Please Note:  Tropical Fish Guide Pocket Edition covers freshwater aquarium fish only, it does not include saltwater/marine fish.  â¶ We support our apps. If you run in to a problem, please visit our website at www.markstevens.co.uk where we have support articles and FAQ's.  Alternatively you can drop us an email and we'll do our best to resolve it for you (please also check your junk mail for replies, just in case).  If you submit a crash report - please email us too! We can fix it much quicker if we can liase with you, thanks.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just what i needed, definitely recommend it to others.  @Craig - It works offline on my nexus 7
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but holes
reviews.comment: Pretty wide selection here. Plants is a bit lacking. My biggest bug bear is that you need a web connection to use it. Tried to open on the train but couldn\'t. A fairly big fail there.
reviews.author: craig wetherall

reviews.title: More profiles
reviews.comment: Great info wish their were more profiles. Great start
reviews.author: Deidre Hawkes

reviews.title: Packed with info
reviews.comment: Easy access to everything you need. Just with there was more info/tools for general fishkeeping built in.
reviews.author: liam horsfield

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: There must be a good 400 profiles and 2000 common names in this app!  New profiles are added with every update too, brilliant
reviews.author: Mario Chip

reviews.title: Perfect, awesome all of the above
reviews.comment: This app is really helpful, tons of Info I recommend this app for beginners and advanced aquarium owners.... It\'s worth it believe me buy it, you won\'t regret it.........
reviews.author: Rafael Cruz

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: This app is wonderful. The pictures are nice and the information is helpful but concise. I just sit and look at random fish for hours when I get a chance.   I love this app.
reviews.author: Benjamin Crouch

reviews.title: New to keeping fish, this app is the best of them all!!!
reviews.comment: If you are a learner, experienced person or professional this app will suit everyone. I\'m delighted that I found this app as it\'s such a valuable source for any person with interest in fish etc. 5***** A+++++ The best of them all, this is the only app you need, it\'s like an all-in-one app for everything you need regarding fish. Buy it you won\'t regret it!
reviews.author: Mathew Russell

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.comment: Perhaps have a facility to select/search geographic location for plants and fishes.  This could then be used when setting up or searching for species/geographic specific aquarium set ups.  Great app.
reviews.author: Lee Wilson

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: Awesome app so helpful in building my aquarium... Clear info and descriptions
reviews.author: daniel viksna

reviews.comment: Great program
reviews.author: Gregory Hensley

reviews.title: Wow. Great App
reviews.comment: Extremely informative. Wide range of fish.  It is incomplete but a great source of info for most of the common aquarium fish. Stevens also has a book with much more info. Cant beat this on the go. Please add info on glowfish danios, lyretail mollies, Dalmatian mollies plz. Thanks for the great app. Worth every penny.
reviews.author: A Ruiz

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Beautifully presented and very comprehensive. This is a real gem! I\'d give it six stars if I could!
reviews.author: John P Coates

reviews.title: I love fish like i love this app
reviews.comment: Thank you :D
reviews.author: Derrick Barros

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: A very informative app. with more species than most books.
reviews.author: Phil Carpenter

reviews.title: Great for fish keepers
reviews.comment: This is a great way to have info. On fish for the people on the go.  Its greeat. Plus it has aquatic plants. Good pictures.  Down load if you like fish at all.
reviews.author: Tammy lamar

reviews.title: Great app for aquarium lovers
reviews.comment: Well set out and uses android application design guidelines. Keep up the great work. Love the content and on demand information.
reviews.author: John X

reviews.title: Take it froman expert
reviews.comment: I work at a LPS and been in the saltwater aquarium business for sometime now and out of all the apps this one is by far the most accurate and useful
reviews.author: Alex Armata

reviews.comment: Cool app, really informative
reviews.author: Julia Morris

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Defo worth the money. Adding new fish all the time
reviews.author: Michael Foster
